data:
PREVENT-IA is an AI-powered education platform designed for workers and managers in industries with high-risk activities. Our product addresses the necessity of reducing workplace accidents and facilitating access to Occupational Risk Prevention (ORP) training. With PREVENT-IA, users can benefit from features like chat support, content annotation, and report generation, all organized by topics and customized to specific activities.

Unlike traditional ORP training methods, PREVENT-IA utilizes advanced technology such as AWS, Python, REST API, and React to ensure scalability, security, and a user-friendly experience. It also incorporates CI/CD, autoscaling groups, and secrets management for seamless integration and maintenance.

To tackle potential risks, PREVENT-IA focuses on addressing negative public opinion on AI, energy consumption, and dependence on AI model providers through continuous improvement and transparency. We also prioritize user experience and feedback, ensuring our platform remains user-friendly and efficient.

In summary, PREVENT-IA is a dynamic, personalized ORP training solution that leverages AI and advanced technology to provide an efficient, user-friendly experience, ultimately reducing workplace accidents and promoting a safer environment for all.
